item.title: White Tipper, 17th October
item.description:
This white tipper is parked on the corner Of Dene Avenue and causing an obstruction there is no tax on this vehicle it is parked with 2 wheels on pavement, resident says its being used even without tax which expired June 2025. its mainly there in the evening. This vehicle needs removing

item.title: Vegetation on amenity green encroaching on footway and obscuring sight lines, 17th October
item.description:
Vegetation and trees on the public amenity green adjacent to 237 Chipperfield Road and 1 Ravenscourt Road, at the intersection between Chipperfield and Ravenscourt Roads, needs pruning. Some of this vegetation is encroaching on the footway and obscuring sight lines. Please could this be pruned?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Ravenscourt Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Advertising banner on park railings, 17th October
item.description:
A large advertising banner for the Revelation House church has been fixed to the railings of the water park in Woolwich Road near the bus stop and park public toilets.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A206, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside UCS Active on Frognal, 17th October
item.description:
Persistent issue of bikes being parked outside of designated bay. They are often parked on the pavement (today perpendicular to the road and therefore blocking it for prams and wheelchairs), in parking bays and blocking driveways.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Frognal, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins on pavement, 17th October
item.description:
The bins are blocking the public footpath and are causing passers-by to use them as general waste bins. It’s frustrating for the locals as most of the time they are overflowing. The bins should be kept on the residents’ property.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Graham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pile of fly tipped item on the main entrance and communal garden of St Vincent House including mattresses, sofas, wooden frames, 17th October
item.description:
Huge pile of fly tipped item on the main entrance and communal garden of St Vincent House including mattresses, sofas, wooden frames. It has come into my attention that tickets get closed before getting actioned. Please do not close ticket until resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fendall Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
